mplex have areas of unusual skin pigmentation. Brown skin spots called lentigines may appear anywhere on the body but tend to occur around the lips, eyes, or genitalia. In addition, some affected individuals have at least one blue-black mole called a blue nevus.",GHR,Carney complex
How many people are affected by Carney complex ?,Carney complex is a rare disorder; fewer than 750 affected individuals have been identified.,GHR,Carney complex
